scripts.start: docker build -t web-app . && docker compose up -d
scripts.docker:build: docker build -t web-app . && docker tag web-app:latest localhost:5000/web-app:latest && docker push localhost:5000/web-app:latest
scripts.kubernetes: kubectl apply -f k8s/namespace.yaml && kubectl apply -f k8s/deployment.yaml && kubectl apply -f k8s/service.yaml && kubectl rollout restart deployment/web-app-deployment -n web-app
